text: man-il neohui dul-i hananimkke hoe gaehamyeon neohuiege bog-i doel geos-ila ttohan neohui ma-eumdo imi geuleohge gi ul-eossnola neohui seologa geubunkke geo yeoghanda hayeodo hananimgwa gabeuliel cheonsawa mid-eum-eulo uiloun jadeul-i geubun-eul doul geos-imyeo cheonsadeuldo deo ug geuleohalila
